text: Has anyone had modules disappear from a page? We're using a child theme and have several pages where some, but not all of the modules from the parent theme are no longer there. They still have a placeholder in the 'contents' menu but show no module name and they don't render on the page (in editor or live). After clicking on the module placeholder, HubSpot shows "The module used to create this content could not be found. It may have been deleted from your account."
We've confirmed the modules do exist and new ones of the same type can even be added to the page.
Hey <@U04J72L6M8D> is it possible the location of the modules has been changed in the design manager? And/or an update to the theme from the developer?

Not that I can tell, everything appears to be in the same place with the same names. One challenge is that I can't seem to find a way to see what module paths the page is trying to resolve in the editor.
